NAVBAR.PROGRESS_SUBHEADING: Here's how your tasks are progressing:

DASHBOARD.NO_TASK_MESSAGE: You're all caught up for now.
DASHBOARD.MOVE_TASK: This dialog shows the current status of the task. You can switch between 'In Progress' and 'Completed'.

FOOTER.BE_PRODUCTIVE: Start your productivity journey with a simple chat. Our team is here to understand your needs and help you stay on top of your tasks. Whether you're managing personal goals or leading a team, we’ll help you track, plan, and deliver—one task at a time.
